DOC: article-20575.txt.xml story | 0 1 2 3 4 | Two Pakistani air force planes crashed in a residential area in northwestern Pakistan on Thursday , killing all four pilots on board and injuring five people on the ground , police said . two pakistani air force plane crash in a residential area in northwestern Pakistan on Thursday , kill all four pilot on board and injure five people on the ground , police say .
